thread.title: JAMES McDuffie

author: JAMES McDuffie
title: JAMES McDuffie
text: I came across InMyArea.com while searching for internet, TV, & phone services to replace my current services with TWC and Dish TV. The customer service rep (Richard) that I spoke with was courteous but very professional, and thoughtful in researching available service's in our area. The final result being that we were able to replace our TV, phone, & internet services at a very reasonable and lower overall cost. Also, adding the pleasure of our online shopping experience was the unexpected gift cards that the rep (Richard) awarded us with for signing up through InMyArea.com. There is no doubt that I will be recommending InMyArea.com to all of my family, friends and associates
